title: Moderator resolves conflict with restorative approach
description: Moderator resolves conflict with restorative approach
content:
Scenario: Moderator resolves conflict with restorative approach
    Given two community members have an escalating disagreement
    And the moderation agent alerts Alex to rising tension
    When Alex reviews the full context and conversation history
    And sees both parties have history of positive contributions
    Then Alex initiates restorative dialogue process
    And both parties can express their concerns privately
    And Alex helps them find common ground and mutual understanding
    And the conflict is resolved without punitive action
    And both parties remain active, valued community members
